messages.content: Yaaaaaas! I need your curly hair routine!
Yo where they at, I want to celebrate with them.
That’s so scummy, I’m hoping the pepperoni just slid down?
This was my biggest problem. And I'd want a nap too. That's why I have to shower at night.
All I want for Christmas is a broken home
I don't mind posts bashing NOED or DS. But I wish this one would make sense or would be funny.
I try to keep my hands busy. I would do better when I have acrylic nails because it wasn’t as easy/just wasn’t the same.
I’m gonna need to see that in writing before I celebrate.
And I’m just sitting here wishing my cat would come at least sit by me.
Uhhh I want someone to do this for me!
Well that made me want to continue to live in Alberta.
Someone get us a [NAME] version of the [NAME] nice lead meme!!!
shaved definitely makes things more swampy for me. I need the hair to soak up the swamp
I WANTED GENERAL LUCK TO MARCH TO NEW ENGLAND AND *THEN* GET SPANKED UP AND DOWN THE FIELD FOR 60 MINUTES.
I’d like to know too. How lucky am I that my first ever relationship was with a pwBPD. sigh
Big yikes. Biiiig yikes. I do feel your pain. I wish I could upvote you more than once.
Germany is the first country in Europe I've been to! Planning on Ireland next, and maybe Croatia(hoping for Germany again, though :) )
Wish they would of given air vehicles some love. A lot of ace pilots hated the game.
Don't see a W tonight. We need a miracle.
I wanna see her debate [NAME]. He would shit all over her.
Good for you! I wish I had run for my life at 18, but brainwashing is real
Become friends with people who work night shift. We are always up at crazy hours and need a distraction from our work.
if only we could blast this type of stuff out there for everyone to hear, then we might just get get those neo libs to the realization.
I just want tk be a random scumbag
Yeah I wish they could just finish 9th every year in the conference
You are my own side. I feel an affinity for this sub and want to make it a good experience for all.
I would focus on being an enlisted Marine first. That’s what you’ll be doing for the next 4 years.
Can you please update me! I'm in the exact position! 24FHL with 21MLL
I just want to live. You're the sad loser for going out of your way to comment something so completely stupid
